title: How can I get wider line spacing in the Message List?
content:
I had my userCrome.css set to widen line spacing in the message list, among other things. Updating to Þb 115 broke this, and since I can't inspect the css, I don't know how to fix this again.

My current css includes:

/* Message List */

  1. threadTree

treechildren::-moz-tree-cell-text { 

   font-size: 16pt !important;    color: black !important

}

/* treechildren::-moz-tree-row { 

   margin-top: 0pt !important;    margin-bottom: 6pt !important;

} */

treecol:not([hideheader="true"]), treecolpicker:not([hideheader="true"]) { -moz-appearance: none !important; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; }

treecol:not([hideheader="true"]):hover, treecolpicker:not([hideheader="true"]):hover { }


I tried relaxed density, but it expands *everything*, not just the message list.

Also, in Firefox, how can I use this site and avoid all the animated headers?
creator: MarjaE

title: Import failed unexpectedly: Could not open file at /run/user/..../tmp-profile/prefs.js
content:
So many problems....

I tried to import a zip of older emails (please note that I have successfully imported this file 2-3yrs ago)

When attempting to import I get the following error message "Import failed unexpectedly, more information may be available in the Error Console"

So the first problem is that there is no information on how to even view the error console! I spent over an hour searching terms and reading through other posts where people ask "How do I open the error console" and their questions GETS IGNORED

Then I found a post saying you can view the Error Console via (Menu) -> Tools -> Developer Tools -> Error Console Except when I tried to open developer tools all of a sudden TBird received an unknown connection from outside the local network WTF!!!

Then I found another post saying press CTRL+SHIFT+J to open error console. WHY IS THIS INFORMATION HIDDEN!!!! WHY IS THERE NO ARTICLE ABOUT IT! Why cant you open the error console from the menu!!!!!!! I wasted hours and lots of effort on such a pointless thing

Once I found the error console I found the following error: Uncaught (in promise) DOMException: Could not open the file at /run/user/1000/app/org.mozilla.Thunderbird/tmp-profile/prefs.js

Thinking that the problem is file access since flatpaks are notorious for being picky about file permissions I temporarily unlocked the permissions (using flatseal) and restarted thunderbird ...at which point my existing email accounts disappeared!!!

I am completely unamused!

<tl:dr> Running Thunderbird 115.2.0 (64-bit) via Flatpak on an Ubuntu 20 kernal Attempting to import a zip of old emails results in "Import failed unexpectedly, more information may be available in the Error Console" because of the error Uncaught (in promise) DOMException: Could not open the file at /run/user/1000/app/org.mozilla.Thunderbird/tmp-profile/prefs.js this file has previously been imported 2-3yrs ago (when import was still an addon)

How do I import the file
creator: borgrel

creator: giancarloanelli.roma

title: Setup for: Sending Mutiple Email Campaigns (using different sending email addresses)
content:
Can this be set up using Thunderbird??

1. Set it up to allow it to send Mutiple Email Campaigns at once (using different sending email addresses) - each seperatly

example:

Email Campaign 01 - using "campaigemail-address@domain.AA" - sends 50 X emails per day Email Campaign 01 - using "campaigemail-address@domain.BB" - sends 50 X emails per day Email Campaign 01 - using "campaigemail-address@domain.CC" - sends 50 X emails per day

  • Each with it's own, seperate email list

etc,,

2. Set the delivery number of emails that can be set each day & increase that number in incriments each until it reaches a max number (like 50 oer sending email address,)

3. Use tracking links in emails being sent that will allow Thunderbird to know if the receiveing person has opened the email

4, Use tracking links in emails being sent that will allow Thunderbird to know if the receiveing person has REPLIED to the email sent

5. Use an automated follow up email that is ONLY sent to those who did NOT REPLY

6. Share a central "email address sent memory file" - that ensures email addresses are NOT sent an email from another Sending email account on Thunderbird

7. All "reply emails" sent to a "shared central Inbox"

8. If I decide to "REPLY" to one of these emails, it will be sent via the SAME email address as the prospect replied to - example "campaigemail-address@domain.BB"
creator: celticwarrior68

title: Thunderbird 115.2.0 vari problemi di visualizzazione
content:
Salve, utilizzo Thunderbird dal 2003, l'ho costantemente aggiornato fino ad oggi senza mai avere un singolo problema. Con l'ultima aggiornamento alla versione 115.2.0 sto avendo un paio di problemi davvero fastidiosi che non mi permettono di utilizzare lo strumento in maniera corretta. Vado per punti:

1) Ero abituato da decenni a selezionare l'ultimo messaggio del giorno e poi chiudevo Thunderbird. Al prossimo riavvio il programma mi presentava sempre l'ultima schermata aperta e si posizionava esattamente sul messaggio che avevo selezionato in precedenza. Con la versione 11.52.0 mi apre la schermata corretta, ma si posiziona casualmente trai i vecchi messaggi ricevuti, esempio si posiziona sui messaggi di Giugno 2023 e non su l'ultimo di Settembre 2023. Tutte le volte mi tocca a scrollare a mano fino ai messaggi odierni, questo comportamento non lo aveva mai fatto prima.

2) Ogni volta che cancello un messaggio, automaticamente Thunderbird mi fa uno scrolling e si posiziona sui messaggi di qualche giorno fa (comportamento davvero fastidioso). Quindi la procedura è: - Cancello un messaggio - Thunderbird mi scrolla da solo sui messaggi più vecchi - A mano utilizzo la scrollbar per tornare sull'ultimo messaggio del giorno Non so se sono riuscito a rendere bene l'idea... Qualcuno mi può aiutare ? Perché da giorni è diventato difficile usare il programma di posta, grazie. Tom
creator: tommaso3

title: Error message: "Your message was sent but a copy was not placed in your sent folder(Sent) due to network etc...
content:
Hi there.

I posted this question a few days ago but have received no response and now cannot find the original posting. :-(

I could really do with some advice about an annoying thing that happens with TB. I have experienced this problem for some time but have recently upgraded my Windows 10 PC which ran version 102.14.0 (64 bit) to a new Windows 10 PC and installed version 115.1.0 (64 bit). Unfortunately, the problem still exists and if anything is worse. I have successfully imported about 15 years worth of historic data.

What seems to happen is this. I go on line and successfully download my messages but if I then try to reply to a message when the connection is still open, I get the attached error message.

I can click either “Retry”, which seems to have no effect or “Save”, sometimes twice which sometimes (but not always) files the message in my “Sent – phil@***********”” Local Folder, not the “Sent” folder as required.. Sometimes, the message disappears completely, which is most inconvenient.

If I close TB (and obviously the connection) and reopen it a short time later, I can answer the message in question, send it to the Outbox by clicking the “Send later” button” and then upload it by clicking on the “Send Unsent Messages” option without receiving the error message or it being posted to the wrong folder.

I have also tried moving / copying the “Sent – phil@***********”” folder to / with the “Sent” folder, but this does not seem to be possible.

I have also tried unchecking the <Account Settings > Copies and Folders > Place a copy in> as suggested in an on-line Mozilla Support article https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1365695 but the outgoing mail completely disappears, being neither saved in the “Sent” nor the “Sent – phil@***********”” folder

Is there a solution to this problem please?

Regards and TIA
creator: phil37

title: TB always downloading
content:
I use Gmail and TB is continuously downloading over and over.

Why? How do I stop this from making the program unresponsive for 20-30 minutes throughout the day?
creator: ChrisThom

title: Unusual Problem with one email address.
content:
BACKGROUND: Thunderbird running on two PC's PC-A & PC-B. PC-A accesses about 10 email addresses AOL & GMAIL accounts (accounts created years ago). PC-B accesses only one AOL account (newly created account). The settings for the AOL account on PC-B is the same as the AOL account settings on PC-A. PC-B can sent emails to accounts on PC-A without any errors.

Now for the ISSUE with an Email to SMS Gateway account to Verizon (format: phonenumber@vtext.com). AOL accounts on PC-A can successfully send to "phonenumber@vtext.com"; no errors. PC-B gets the ATTACHED ERROR MESSAGE when trying to send "phonenumber@vtext.com" However, the same email "phonenumber@vtext.com" sent directly from the AOL website account used by PC-B succeeds without errors.

Anyone have suggestions as to why PC-B is getting the attached error message, and PC-A does not error, nor does the the AOL website account used by PC-B error?

X.
creator: xytsrm

title: several "sort by" options have been disabled in Thunderbird 115.1.0
content:
On upgrading to 115.1.0 on OpenSUSE Linux, message sorting seems to be substantially different. The differences appear both for Local Folders and my IMAP folders, including gmail. In particular, when selecting View->Sort by from the menu, all of these options are greyed out:

  • Received
  • Order Received
  • Priority
  • From
  • Recipient
  • Size
  • Status
  • Tags

For most of my folders, I don't want to trust the "Date" on the message, and I prefer "Order Received," so that's how I had my system set up. (It's a particularly useless option for any "Junk" or "Spam" folder.) The "Sort by" menu still shows "Order Received" as being selected on those folders ... but now it's greyed out, and it doesn't work, and new mail doesn't show up in the folder (or, if it does show up, I have no idea where it's located). Yes, for the next question: clicking on the "Date" column does cause the sort order to switch to "Date" and does appear to work, but that's not what I want. I've searched multiple times for bugs or other web articles about how to fix this or at least some acknowledgment that it's an issue, but I haven't found anything other than people suggesting sorting by clicking on the columns. How do I get the original message sorting features back?
creator: carlsonj

title: When opening attachments from compose new message window, thunderbird makes empty .part files in ~
content:
I am using Thunderbird 115.2.0 on Linux / Debian “Bookworm”, although this problem has been around for a while and so has been a feature on previous versions.

If I open a file from the compose new message window, Thunderbird creates an empty file in my home directory which has a string of 8 random characters, followed by sometimes the file extension, followed by “.part”.

The following is a current sample:

~$ ls -lh *part -rw------- 1 jacobh jacobh 0 Sep 11 16:34 awY5IqBI.html.part -rw------- 1 jacobh jacobh 0 Sep 11 16:28 cfFcyHkJ.doc.part -rw------- 1 jacobh jacobh 0 Sep 11 16:07 DiPn-4cu.docx.part -rw------- 1 jacobh jacobh 0 Sep 7 11:41 g7ngLyYT.docx.part -rw------- 1 jacobh jacobh 0 Sep 11 16:23 OQmzzCQA.docx.part -rw------- 1 jacobh jacobh 0 Sep 11 13:43 oudly2Yk.docx.part -rw------- 1 jacobh jacobh 0 Sep 11 16:24 PFBSL0l2.doc.part -rw------- 1 jacobh jacobh 0 Sep 11 13:45 quY1cBL5.docx.part -rw------- 1 jacobh jacobh 0 Sep 11 13:45 s8OlybHI.docx.part -rw------- 1 jacobh jacobh 0 Sep 11 16:27 _ZjeIW77.html.part

Oddly the .html.part files are not generated by opening HTML files but instead by opening PDFs.

This has been annoying me for ages and ages (on more than one machine) but it is only today that I noticed the circumstances in which these files were being created!

All other temporary files seem to go into /tmp

Does anyone know why these files might be being created and what I can do to get rid of them? I presume they serve no purpose.

Thanks!

Jacob
creator: Sarrusophone

title: Thunderbird creates multiple messages in Drafts folder for each save
content:
I've asked before and gotten no response. I am once again trying to get this solved. I'd really like to get this finally fixed. I'm not sure if it's TB's fault of the email server's fault. If not a fix, what steps can I do to debug this or provide more information?

Thunderbird keeps creating multiple draft messages for each save. I can start composing an email, hit Ctl-s to save and I get an unread message in Drafts. If I hit Ctl-s to save again (or TB autosaves, it doesn't matter) I get yet another unread message in Drafts. This just builds up crud which needs to be manually deleted. I am using IMAP and like the functionality where if I saved a draft on my desktop, I could pick it up on my laptop later.

Thunderbird 102.15.0 Email server: Postfix 3.3.0 Dovecot 2.2.33.2 on Ubuntu 18.04
creator: Andrew5

title: HTML rendering during MFA is broken.
content:
In trying to complete sign on to an IMAP or OWL account, I have to go through an MFA login. After entering my MFA username and password, I am supposed to get a page to choose how I get my MFA code. Thunderbird just renders a blank pop-up. This prevents me from adding the account.

I have destroyed and re-created profiles, that has not fixed the issue. I can run through the MFA process in firefox, brave, and evolution. The renderer in thunderbird seems to be breaking where no others do.

I installed the browseintab extension and tried to log into the web version of outlook and get the same blank pop-up behavior.

I was able to open a developer console during the sign in process and I do see some errors but am not sure what the source of the trouble is.

title: Upgraded to 115.2 and all mail folders disappear on each startup...
content:
... and the only way to restore them is to delete the folderCache.json, session.json, xulstore.json files from my profile directory. But each time I shut down Thunderbird and restart it, the same problem returns and I have to start over.

As this causes Thunderbird to lose all customizations to folder display, column displays, color badges, etc, and requires Thunderbird to download all message headers in my 6 email accounts, it's wasting a ton of my time.

All the accounts are still intact and it even says it's downloading email for each inbox on startup, I just can't see any of it because there's no folders displayed on the left side-bar.

And mind you, this was just a "upgrade"... when I tried to migrate my default profile to another computer (new workstation) it wouldn't load the proper profile without doing the -p flag on the executable and then after, has this same problem where it first displays proper accounts/folders but then on restart loses it all.

Luckily I found another users post online about deleting those internal cache/config files (for a completely unrelated problem with an older version of tbird) or I'd have been completely stuck.

Anyone have any suggestions on migrating BACK to the previous most stable build of pre "Supernova"? This thing isn't fully baked IMO.

And also, is there a better way to submit massive errors like this to the developers?

Thanks...
creator: psychprod1

title: OpenPGP in TB v.115.2: Auto-sign replies/forwarded messages doesn't work
content:
I am using OpenPGP to automatically digitally sign (not encrypt) all outgoing messages, incl. replies and forwarded messages. Before updating TB to v.115.2/"Supernova", this was working flawlessly.

Now, in v 115.2, auto-sign only works with new messages. Whey I am replying to or forwarding a message, OpenPGP digital signing is disabled, and every time I need to enable it manually.

In account setting > End-To-End Encryption, "Sign unencrypted messages" is checked. Is there anything other that needs to be enabled/... for auto-signing of Re/Fwd to work as before?

Thanks.
creator: vt

creator: lajoes

title: Nelze provést údržbu složky
content: Při pokusu provést údržbu složek se pravidelně stává, že u složky "Doručená pošta" to vypíše zprávu podle následujícího obrázku a údržba se nedokončí. Na disku je 275 GB volného místa. Údržba podsložek proběhne v pořádku. Text zprávy je: "Nelze provést údržbu složky Doručená pošta v účtu Místní složky, protože není možné do složky zapisovat. Zkontrolujte, zda máte na disku dost místa a máte právo pro zápis do dané složky a celou akci zopakujte". Přitom do složky Doručená pošta se běžně zapisuje, například při načítání nových e-mailů.
creator: ssedlacek

title: Thunderbird Folder Icons?
content: Why does the icon for "All Mail" show the same trash can icon as the Trash folder instead of the Archive Icon? I am truly stumped!
creator: saintsuperb

title: Any way to sort by From, THEN by number of messages in each sorted group?
content:
This was asked before (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1370917#question-reply) but did not get good answer.

"I want to sort inbox by sender. Then sort the result by sender group size. For cleaning inbox."

If I do "Sort by > From, Ascending, Group by Sort" then "Threads > Collapse All Threads", I can see which senders have sent me many emails, but I want to sort this list by the number of emails from that sender, NOT by the name of the sender.

I want the From with the most messages to be at the top.

Is this possible?

Thanks!
creator: zgilad

title: INFO Folder has disappeared after upgrade.
content:
After an upgrade, was not able to receive new emails, but had all the current folders. After waiting overnight, I am able to send and receive new emails, BUT an INFO Folder (not Local Folder) has disappeared with lots of important messages. Any suggestions on how to retrieve that INFO Folder? Thank You in advance. 

  -   Will M.
creator: wmalle

title: Can I return to an older version of Thunderbird?
content:
Sorry, I can't check if other people are asking; I get migraines from the animations here.

I updated to Thunderbird 115. It broke the css I used for message list spacing and deliberately overrides the system colors I picked for readability. I am sick of trying to debug it and want to return to a better-working version. Is this possible?
creator: MarjaE

title: Download from ISP to Thunderbird Quit
content: 'Thunderbird has stopped delivering emails to my desktop computer since September 5, 2023. Two of us share the Thunderbird account but I am the only one having the problem. I have checked the settings and mine are exactly the same as hers. I get a failed to authenticate error message after a long pause.
creator: Marinchip

title: Unable to remove unused email account (Thunderbird 115.2.0)
content:
I'm running Thunderbird 115.2.0 on a 1918 vintage Macbook Pro under Ventura 13.5.2

There is an unused email account I want to remove but am unable to do so.

"Account Settings" reports "The following is a special account. There are no identities associated with it."

When I select the account and go to "Account Actions", the "Remove Account" button is greyed out. If I select other accounts it is NOT greyed out, only for this one unused account.

There was another account with the same email address that I was able to remove, but this "duplicate" account seems to be rather permanent.

Suggestions would be appreciated.
creator: joe.west1

title: as of 9/10/2023 unable to send email from thunderbird client (outlook.live) account
content:
I have searched the internet for 2 days to find an answer to this. looks like this has been an on going issue with thunderbird and microsoft outlook.live for some time.

My mail client has been working fine for months. then all of a sudden I am getting "server time out" unable to send mail from thunderbird. I updated to the latest 115 version to see if that would fix it, but it did not.

my outgoing mail settings are SMTP server are set Security and Authentication, to STARTTLS, and Oauth2. port 587 I have found that it sometimes works, and then for unknown reason stops working....

the strange thing is I have another outlook account and it works fine. I have compared settings and they are identical, so the only thing I can think is that MS side is timing out on the log in, or not accepting my password? When I click on the send button, for just a second I get a popup from outlook, with a blanks screen, I assume it is logging into my office account. it then vanishes. while on TB, there is a dialog box stating "sending message" and it sits there until it times out! several minutes later! see attachments.

Message could not be sent because the connection to outgoing server smtp.office365.com timed out. 


Please someone help me! I have been using TB for close to 10 years. I don't want to change to another client, but will If i can't resolve this issue.
creator: SumoBot

title: Cannot send email after upgrade from TB 102.15 to 115.2
content: I have 2 mail accounts synced to TB. Both are hotmail accounts. I can send emails from 1 but not the other after updating TB from 102.15 to 115.2. Everything else seems to work. I've changed no settings and they seem correct as far as I can tell. When I try to send mail from the problem account, a blank browser pop-up comes for a few seconds (authentication?) then disappears; then, the "sending" bubble comes up and then times out giving this error message: "Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.office365.com timed out. Try again." What is a solution for this? Thanks in advance.
creator: natehathaway

title: Incoming email missing the body.
content: Every once in a while a complete series of incoming emails has nothing in the body. I click any recent 'good' email. Perhaps the subject is "XYZ". Clicking any of the 'bad' emails will show the good email's From, To, and subject of "XYZ". It seems to last for, maybe 20 incoming emails, then the issue stops. It has happened several times over the last year. If I go out to Xfinity the same emails do not have this issue. How do I fix this?
creator: JimJamie

title: how to install version 102 when version 115 is already downloaded
content: I want to use ImportExportTools NG but it is not available for version 115. I already downloaded version 115 so I want to downgrade my thunderbird version to 102. How can I do it
creator: dnjseka927

title: Thunderbird  in W11
content: Installed TBird on new computer with W11. In the Set Up Existing Email Address page after entering the email address and password the message "Configuration found in Mozilla ISP database" is displayed. With the IMAP configuration selected clicking "Done" the message "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password". This combination of configuration, ID and password works on my existing W7 computer. How do I get Thunderbird to recognize my email and password?
creator: user270191669559753684582977611666966739545

title: Thunderbird email won't download
content: I re-installed Thunderbird but email will still not download. I can send though.
creator: petenlil

title: Asking for password every time I open the client
content: Since this supernova update I'm being asked for my outlook password nearly every single time I open up the client. This never happened prior to this update and I've been using Thunderbird now for at least 5 years.
creator: Dicehunter

title: Thunderbird Supernova - open email in a new tab with middle mouse button
content:
Good morning, how I can enable again opening email in a new tab with click on middle mouse button? Before upgrade to Supernova working fine this, after upgrade I am not able find how enable this again.

Thank you Jan Zilina
creator: zilina

title: Thunderbird,POP,Gmail - emails in linked thunderbird inbox, but not showing up in gmail
content:
So, I'm helping my mom out with transferring emails from one gmail account to another.

I'm successfully able to import the .mbox files from the googletakeouts folder into the thunderbird account that is linked to her gmail through Pop, (not IMAP), using an older version of thunderbird (102.9.1) [since the new version you can't import .mbox files - kind of a deal breaker if you're trying to do massive email migrations because google has decided that .mbox files is the cleanest way to do it, but boy am i so grateful this actually worked].

On thunderbird I see all ~112,000 emails all nice and pretty in the local files. So I then in select all and move all the emails into [Inbox]- bam no problems...but now when I go into the gmail account in the chrome browser I don't see them. IMAP and POP are enabled on the account, they're also not in the [All mail] folder. They just aren't there. I've quit thunderbird and restarted, and did the same to the gmail account. Switched the SMTP port for thunderbird from 465 to 587. Nothing

TLDR - I can pull the emails up in thunderbird no problem. But i don't see them in the gmail inbox. Do I change server type from POP/local storage to IMAP? what's the fix boss

much appreciated!
creator: ssraj

title: Latest Thunderbird - Customisation
content:
Hi,

New here, tho' a long time T'bird user.

Upgraded to the latest T'bird the other day. This was on what is now my old W10 PC. Customisation mostly derived from how it was pre upgrade to the new (lovely) version. See first graphic

Installed Tbird on my new W11 PC. All fine. However, I am really struggling with the customisation, and have been completely unable to emulate what you see in the first image. Every time I try to add an icon/text, it is not allowed.

Second image show the current state of play. How do II make it look like the first?
creator: jeremypoynton

title: Cannot delete mail immediately - new Thunderbird & Gmail
content:
Hello,

I was using the previous version of Thunderbird without any issue with Gmail and IMAP.

I have set up my accounts so that when I delete a mail in thunderbird, it gets automatically and completely removed from the server (not even stored in Trash server folder), after getting a confirmation popup (done via an extension). I choose the corresponding option in the account settings page.

With the latest version however: When I select the option to delete the mail immediately from the server in the account settings, The mail is only marked as read in web Gmail and not deleted. When I select the option "Move to trash folder" the mail is correctly sent to Trash on Thunderbird AND the server but I don't want to have to empty trash manually.

What can I do to reproduce the old behavior?
creator: leraleur

title: Tbird font changes after emoji
content: See image. Why does my font change after using an emoji?
creator: jeremypoynton
